statements: SELECT * FROM ethical_frameworks;
SELECT theme, description FROM ethical_frameworks WHERE collaborator = 'Company A';
SELECT id, theme FROM ethical_frameworks WHERE theme LIKE '%privacy%';
SELECT collaborator, COUNT(collaborator) AS collaborator_count FROM ethical_frameworks GROUP BY collaborator;
SELECT * FROM ethical_frameworks ORDER BY theme DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ethical_frameworks WHERE theme = 'Privacy' ORDER BY collaborator ASC;
SELECT id, description FROM ethical_frameworks WHERE collaborator LIKE '%Software%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, theme, collaborator, description FROM ethical_frameworks ORDER BY theme ASC, collaborator DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT theme FROM ethical_frameworks WHERE collaborator = 'Open Source' ORDER BY theme ASC;
SELECT * FROM ethical_frameworks WHERE theme IN ('Privacy', 'Data Security') AND collaborator IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM ethical_frameworks;
SELECT framework_name, description FROM ethical_frameworks WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT framework_name, created_date FROM ethical_frameworks ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_development_projects WHERE ethics_review_status = 'Approved';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ar_development_projects WHERE lead_researcher_id = 2 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT id, framework_name, description FROM ethical_frameworks WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT framework_name, description, created_date FROM ethical_frameworks WHERE id = 5;
SELECT lead_researcher_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ar_development_projects WHERE ethics_review_status = 'pending' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT project_name, end_date, start_date, lead_researcher_id FROM ar_development_projects WHERE lead_researcher_id = 3 ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT framework_name, description, researcher_id, created_date FROM ethical_frameworks WHERE research_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Ethicists;
SELECT name, affiliation FROM Ethicists WHERE expertise='AI Ethics';
SELECT researcher_id, name, organization FROM Researchers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT title, description FROM Ethical_Frameworks WHERE last_updated > '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM Ethicists JOIN Researchers ON Ethicists.ethicist_id = Researchers.researcher_id;
SELECT * FROM Ethicists WHERE ethicist_id = 1;
SELECT name, affiliation FROM Ethicists WHERE expertise = 'Privacy';
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE field = 'Bioethics';
SELECT framework_id, title FROM Ethical_Frameworks WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, organization FROM Researchers JOIN Ethicists ON Researchers.name = Ethicists.name;
SELECT * FROM Ethicists;
SELECT Name, Institution FROM Ethicists ORDER BY Institution;
SELECT ID, Name FROM Researchers WHERE Specialization = 'AI';
SELECT * FROM AR_Development WHERE End_Date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT Framework_Name, Description FROM Ethical_Frameworks WHERE ID = 3;
SELECT * FROM Ethicists ORDER BY Name DESC;
SELECT Name, Institution FROM Ethicists WHERE Institution = 'University';
SELECT Researchers.Name, Ethicists.Name FROM Researchers INNER JOIN Ethicists ON Researchers.ID = Ethicists.ID;
SELECT * FROM AR_Development WHERE Start_Date >= '2022-01-01' AND End_Date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_projects FROM AR_Development;
SELECT * FROM Ethicists;
SELECT name, expertise FROM Ethicists ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM AR_Development WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT framework_name, description FROM Ethical_Frameworks WHERE LENGTH(description) > 50;
SELECT ethicist_id, name, expertise FROM Ethicists WHERE expertise LIKE '%ethics%';
SELECT * FROM Ethicists;
SELECT name, expertise FROM Researchers WHERE specialization='AI';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM AR_Development ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT framework_name, description FROM Ethical_Frameworks WHERE framework_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;

SELECT e.name AS Ethicist, r.name AS Researcher, p.project_name AS Project, f.framework_name AS Framework FROM Collaborations c JOIN Ethicists e ON c.ethicist_id = e.ethicist_id JOIN Researchers r ON c.researcher_id = r.researcher_id JOIN AR_Development p ON c.project_id = p.project_id JOIN Ethical_Frameworks f ON c.framework_id = f.framework_id ORDER BY e.name ASC, r.name DESC;
